description: This file is an example of how should you store your database configs. Rename this file to 'config.json' to use defaults.
hostname: Name or IP adress of the DB server you store data at.
port: Port to connect to DB server.
databaseName: Name of the database where data is stored. should be 'hierarchymanager' unless other is explicitly reuired.
username: DB user name. User should have modification rights.
